title: Zilean's Ult needs to flash the target's screen.
body:
There needs to be 4 half-naked japanese men throwing up peace signs screaming YATTA when I throw my Zilean ult onto somebody.

Why?

Teammate's at 5% health. Screen is blowing up with particle effects from 10 different characters. Who's going to notice a small chime and a few small gold floating things around your character? 

So, they keep running away...only to notice they're ulted. 

So they turn around.

Run into the battle.

Ult drops off. They die.

This is the worst designed ult in the game imo. It requires headsets for each of your teammates to effectively let them know they're ulted.

I want an alarm. I want a flash. I want something to pop the fuck up and say HEY I JUST USED MY CHARACTER'S MARQUEE ABILITY ON YOU PLEASE DON'T FUCKING WASTE IT.

Obligatory I hate you Rito. I hate you. FIx your god damn champion.

replies.body:
Didn't they add an effect... like a year ago? That puts an effect on the whole screen- like light-gold on the whole thing, VERY noticable?

Yes. Yes they did. It's very comforting.

I disagree.  It's not that they don't notice it per se, it's that their reaction times and decision making isn't quick enough to go back into the enemy team, and often times when they do that, the enemy team won't attack them because they'll proc the ultimate.

yep, because seeing a tiny stop watch over your head that lasts for 5 seconds while you're in a bad situation and focused on surviving is going to make any impact


if they gave Zilean a super saiyan particle effect that does the same to you and makes a pillar of light surround you, then you'd notice, but currently as zilean, you have to kite at your maximum range where your teammate can't tell if you're going to ult or not, or get close, and get instakilled

"a tiny stop watch"

Do you even know what his ultimate looks like??
hardly, but it was barely noticeable even when I was the zilean that cast it
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rW6M8D41ZWU I think I found your suggested change :^)
